thread.title: Hopdoddy Rice Village sets March 6 opening
thread.title_full: Hopdoddy Rice Village sets March 6 opening

author: Greg Morago
title: Hopdoddy Rice Village sets March 6 opening

locations.name: hopdoddy burger bar at river oaks district

text:
By Greg Morago , Houston Chronicle Updated 1:00 pm, Wednesday, February 15, 2017 Photo: Gary Coronado, Houston Chronicle Image 1 of / 18 Close Image 1 of 18 Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. The burger brand will open its second Houston restaurant on March 6 at 5510 Morningside in Rice Village. Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. The burger brand will open its second Houston restaurant on March 6 at 5510 Morningside in Rice Village. Photo: Gary Coronado, Houston Chronicle Image 2 of 18 Ahi Tuna Burger, sushi-grade tuna, sunflower sprouts, Nori chips, teriyaki, honey wasabi, mayo, pickled ginger, red leaf lettuce, white onion, beefsteak tomato, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Ahi Tuna Burger, sushi-grade tuna, sunflower sprouts, Nori chips, teriyaki, honey wasabi, mayo, pickled ginger, red leaf lettuce, white onion, beefsteak tomato, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Photo: Gary Coronado, Houston Chronicle Image 3 of 18 La Bandita, black bean-corn patty, avocado, Texas goat cheese, arugula, cilantro pesto, chipotle mayo, white onion, beefsteak tomato on whole wheat, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. La Bandita, black bean-corn patty, avocado, Texas goat cheese, arugula, cilantro pesto, chipotle mayo, white onion, beefsteak tomato on whole wheat, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Photo: Gary Coronado, Houston Chronicle Image 4 of 18 Goodnight Good Cause, Angus beef, Tillamook cheddar, caramelized onions, jalapeños, hickory bbq, sassy sauce, red leaf lettuce, beefsteak tomato, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Goodnight Good Cause, Angus beef, Tillamook cheddar, caramelized onions, jalapeños, hickory bbq, sassy sauce, red leaf lettuce, beefsteak tomato, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Photo: Gary Coronado, Houston Chronicle Image 5 of 18 La Bandita, black bean-corn patty, avocado, Texas goat cheese, arugula, cilantro pesto, chipotle mayo, white onion, beefsteak tomato on whole wheat, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. La Bandita, black bean-corn patty, avocado, Texas goat cheese, arugula, cilantro pesto, chipotle mayo, white onion, beefsteak tomato on whole wheat, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Photo: Gary Coronado, Houston Chronicle Image 6 of 18 The Classic Burger, Angus beef, red leaf lettuce, white onion, beefsteak tomato, sassy sauce, bacon and cheese, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. The Classic Burger, Angus beef, red leaf lettuce, white onion, beefsteak tomato, sassy sauce, bacon and cheese, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Photo: Gary Coronado, Houston Chronicle Image 10 of 18 The Skinny Dip, a 7 oz Coronita dunked into a goblet of frozen margarita, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. The Skinny Dip, a 7 oz Coronita dunked into a goblet of frozen margarita, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Photo: Gary Coronado, Houston Chronicle Image 11 of 18 Hey, Neighbor! Bloody Mary with beet and tomato juice and a spicy house blend, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Hey, Neighbor! Bloody Mary with beet and tomato juice and a spicy house blend, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Photo: Gary Coronado, Houston Chronicle Image 12 of 18 Red Velvet Cake shake at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Red Velvet Cake shake at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Bloody Mary with beet and tomato juice and a spicy house blend, at Hopdoddy Burger Bar at River Oaks District. Photo: Gary Coronado, Houston Chronicle Image 14 of 18 Jackalope burger at Hopdoddy Burger Bar. This limited-edition burger will be available April 29-May 1, 2016. Jackalope burger at Hopdoddy Burger Bar. This limited-edition burger will be available April 29-May 1, 2016. Photo: Hopdoddy Burger Bar, Courtesy Photo Image 15 of 18 Hopdoddy Burger Bar of Austin will open a new Houston restaurant in April at River Oaks District, Houston. Shown here: the Terlingua burger with chile con carne, cheddar, Fritos and "sassy sauce." Hopdoddy Burger Bar of Austin will open a new Houston restaurant in April at River Oaks District, Houston. Shown here: the Terlingua burger with chile con carne, cheddar, Fritos and "sassy sauce." Photo: River Oaks District Image 16 of 18 
Hopdoddy Burger Bar of Austin will open a new Houston restaurant in April at River Oaks District, Houston. Shown here: the Goodnight burger with cheddar, hickory barbecue sauce, caramelized onions and sliced jalapeno (foreground) and the ahi tuna burger (background).
